name: SEEDS (JohnyWuijtsNL)
description:
This game is what I used as my intake project to get into the school I wanted to go to (it worked). It is also the second completed game I made. It was made somewhere in 2019. I made all the code, graphics, music and sfx myself, except for the font.

SEEDS was supposed to be a compilation of various games that had the same goal of getting a seed to the end of the level. It turned out to only be a collection of 2 games, one of them being Dandelion, and the other one being Strawberry.

I used krita to draw the sprites:

https://krita.org/en

I used Bosca Ceoil for the music and sfx:

https://boscaceoil.net/

I used Audacity to edit the music and sfx:

https://www.audacityteam.org/
